articles.title: New way of preserving kidneys for transplant successfully trialled at NUH - The Straits Times
articles.description:
Hypothermic machine perfusion reduces the risk of the kidney failing after transplant.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - A new way of preserving kidneys before they are implanted in kidney transplant patients has been successfully trialled on three patients at National University Hospital (NUH).
